locations.description1: The sun is setting on a clear night under a full moon. You are standing on a quiet dirt road in front of an old, run-down mansion.
You go to the front porch and knock on the door. No one answers. The door is slightly ajar.
locations.description2: You are to the front porch. The door is slightly ajar.

locations.description1: As you enter, the front door slams shut and locks behind you. Now you are inside a large foyer. There is a staircase which leads up to the second floor. There are rooms to the east and west of you. A body is lying on the floor.
locations.description2: You are inside a large foyer. There is a staircase which leads up to the second floor. There are rooms to the east and west of you. A body is lying on the floor.

locations.description1: The man is dead, but it is not clear why. You find a note on the body that says, 'Valuable jewels are hidden in this house. Finders keepers!'
You are in a dining room.
You are in a hallway at the top of the stairs. The hallway goes north, east, and west.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door in front of you.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door in front of you.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door in front of you.
